title: Lunar Revel Shop Simply Disappeared
body: I logged at my account and there was my lunar revel shop, but a few hours later I went there to check it again to know if any of my skins have changed since it's happening with many others players, but when I logged I saw that the lunar revel shop wasn't there anymore

replies.body: This is a known issue and we're looking into it. Thanks for the report! ^-^
